Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 215-A, to amend the New York City charter, in relation to requiring the chancellor of the city school district to submit to the Council quarterly reports on the status of all school capital projects.
Items.MatterName: Veto Int. 215-A, Quarterly report on the status of Board of Ed capital projects.
